title: Sir Bennet
description: The deal is done. After six years of torture at the bottom of Mount Verta, Dexter Bennet reconnects with Sara and his children for the first time. But, Sara is not alone. Dexter grows suspicious of the twin’s father figure, Guy. The man is caught breaking into their home at night, confessing his love for Sara, and, most disturbing, questioning his kids’ odd behavior.Something is off with the twins and Guy knows it. Dexter is desperate to figure it out first. The more he learns, the more he questions whether he ever made it out of Mount Verta.
author: Nicolette Beebe
